body.name: Aptkdoe Smart Watch, Fitness Tracker with Dail Calls Speaker, 1.85" Touch Screen IP68 Waterproof Smartwatch, 112 Sport Modes Activity Tracker with Heart Rate Monitor, Pedometer Watch for Women Blue
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: 1.85" Touch Screen and Call Functionality: Smartwatch features a 1.85" TFT-color touch screen, providing you with a high-quality visual experience. You can choose from a variety of pre-installed watch faces or even customize your own using your favorite photos in the app. With the ability to make and receive calls directly from your fitness watch, you can dial the phone number on the screen to answer the call. In addition, you can also view your call history directly on the activity tracker.

Take Control of Your Health: The HR sensor of smart watch offers accurate and effective heart rate monitoring, allowing you to make informed decisions about your health and adjust your lifestyle accordingly. Additionally, sleep tracking function records your deep, light, and awake sleeps preeplepis patterns to provide you a com quality, helping you make adjustments to your lifestyle for better rest. With our fitness smart watch, you can become healthier and lead a more fulfilling life.

Multitude of Sport Modes: Our sport watch offers 112 different exercise modes. You can use it for outdoor activities like hiking or cycling, or indoor sports like yoga or aerobics. From basketball and football to yoga and Pilates, whether you're a serious athlete or just trying to stay in shape, the smart watches for women man allows you to monitor your heart rate, distance, speed, and calorie burn in real time. With our digital watch, you can track your progress and achieve your fitness goals.

Long Battery Life and IP68 Waterproof Rating: Sport watches for men boasts excellent waterproof performance with IP68 rating, providing superior waterproofing capabilities in any environment (excluding seawater or prolonged exposure to hot water). Its unique magnetic charging design allows for a full charge in 1.5-2H. Once fully charged, it can last up to 7days. With its outstanding performance, this pedometer watch is an excellent tool that can provide reliable support in both work and leisure.

Reliable Companion: This smart fitness watch is not only stylish but also has pedometer, heart rate monitor, weather updates. It's the perfect companion for your daily routine. You can also get notifications for calls and messages from apps like Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram, and more, it is your ultimate personal assistant. Smart watch waterproof also comes equipped with a remote music and camera controller, sedentary reminders, alarm clock, stopwatch, and find your phone feature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable & Good Quality
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this watch as a gift and I was very happy with how it turned out. It has amazing features like monitoring heart rate and blood pressure all for an affordable price. Moreover, the battery lasts for days without charging in between making it efficient since I forget to charge it. Overall definitely a great purchase and would recommend to anyone looking for an affordable smart watch.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Achieves everything a $300 watch will do
reviews.reviewText: Love this product! I love that I can customize the watch face with a my kid's pictures. I love how it tells me how many hours I slept, my steps, my heart rate, the weather. I love being able to see my text messages when I'm away from my phone. I can answer phone calls and speak with it. The best part is the money I saved by not buying a 3 digit price tag watch. This was $27 on Prime Day!The only downfall (if any), is the gold on the watch kind of wears off in some spots. But for the price I paid, I can't complain.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I mostly got this watch tell time, count my steps, and read incoming messages. I like being able to change the face to what I prefer (analog). It does pulse ox and heart rate, stop watch and timer, and find your phone. All useful stuff. I haven't had troubles and the band is very comfortable. Got this to replace a similar one that was older and scratched up. I'm pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stopped Working-wont charge
reviews.reviewText: I loved how simple and easy this watch is. Its perfect for someone whom never had a smart watch before and wanted to try it out like me. So I was super upset after my 4th time of it dying and me trying to charge it, it stopped turning on and charging itself. Super upset about it so i cant give it a full 5 stars for that. but aside from the that, the phone call part works amazing, no patchiness, the timer was perfect, easy to connect my phone to its Bluetooth to listen to music, the speakers are acceptingly great for what i was expecting. definitely would love to get another soon when i have enough money to buy one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
reviews.reviewText: It links to my phone but text messages and calls do not show up. The time only reads in 24 hour time. I can Skip songs when listening to music but I have to spend a couple minutes looking for the music button on the watch. If you just want to tell time the watch is fine. That is not why I bought it though

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Would never sync with phone.
reviews.reviewText: I could answer and make calls on the watch but would never since with phone network so the basic function of telling time didn't work.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Affordable and accurate!
reviews.reviewText: I was originally looking for something to track my daily steps but I decided to purchase this smart watch instead. It was extremely affordable and it has so many added features. I was able to sync it with my phone easily. Added bonus is how pretty it is!
Reçue un jour avant la date prévue. La montre est juste magnifique très stylée et surtout elle répond en tout point à mes attentes. Le prix est largement accessible pour une montre de cette qualité.

reviews.reviewTitle: Das zweite Band hat eine andere Farbe
reviews.reviewText: Ich bin mir bei der schlafaufzeichnung noch nicht ganz sicher, aber einmal hat sie definitiv nicht gepasst.Aber um genaueres zu sagen muss ich das noch etwas länger beobachten.

Die Smart watch sieht super aus und ist einfach zu bedienen. Ich habe sie meiner 12jährigen Tochter geschenkt, aber sie passt auch mir sehr gut. Meine Tochter liebt die zahlreichen Funktionen, die sie hat. Ich würde sie jederzeit wieder kaufen.

reviews.reviewTitle: Une bonne montre... et pas chère 👍
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. (C'est ma première montre connectée, donc je n'ai pas de moyen de comparaison.)La montre a l'air de qualité.Je l'ai prise bleu nuit et elle est sobre comme je voulais.Elle est fournie avec 2 bracelets ; sport et classique.Je l'ai prise comme podomètre et pour recevoir les messages.La fonction téléphone marche impeccable. Je peux décrocher/ appeler et parler sans problème avec la montre.L'écran est lumineux, net et réactif ( moins pour le bouton l'atéral, utiliser l'écran pour le chrono plutôt que le bouton )On peut choisir le type de cadran.Je n'ai pas vu celui qui est affiché sur Amazon, domage mais il y en a un dispo complet et pas trop chargé et flashy ( voir photo)On peut aussi mettre une image au choix en fond d'écran comme une photo de notre galerie si on veut.Sinon il y en a aussi une centaine dispo téléchargeables via le téléphone mais beaucoup sont kitchoss ! Ca manque de classe et de sobriété. On n'est pas dans des skins de qualité de la concurrence au de gamme.Je n'ai pas essayé à la piscine l'étanchéité, normalement on peut nager avec ( ip68).Le taille du texte (non paramétrable) est ok mais pour lire mes messages, il me faut mes lunettes. Le texte est partiellement traduit en français dans la montre, mais rien de gênant.Des erreurs de traduction française sur l'interface du téléphone ( chaleur=calories , etapes= pas, formation= entraînement,...) .Pas d'applications particulières sur la montre ni de jeux.Il y a...-La météo local ( avec les tendances de la semaine)- le rythme cardiaque analysé en continu.- l'oxygène dans le sang- analyse du sommeil (?)- contacts téléphone- minuteur qui ne sonne pas mais qui Vibre juste 3 fois- Un chronomètre- contrôle de la musique (pas encore essayé)- assistant vocal GoogleJe n'ai pas trouvé de réveil alarme. C'est quand même la base d'une montre ?!! Faut utiliser son téléphone.Gadget; On peut déclencher une photo de son téléphone en remuant sa montre.J'ai un bug sur le son de l'assitant vocal, le son passe de la montre puis du telephone toute les 2 secondes empêchant au final de comprendre la phrase.Je ne sais pas si cela vient de la montre , du bluetooth ou du téléphone qui est vieux de 5 ans (Xiaomi MI A2) ? Je le testerai sur un tel plus récent.Pour le prix, c'est quand même une bonne première montre je ne regrette pas. A voir avec le temps ( j'ai quand même pris la garantie Amazon 3 ans )
Super montre juste une question comment on fait pour changer les cadran ?
